import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; class Query extends Component{ static async getInitialProps() { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'); const questionList = await res.json() return { questionList } } componentWillMount() { this.setState({ questionList: this.props.questionList }) } render(){ return( {this.props.questionList}
